name: Phone Crew Showdowns
description:
After 2 months of work, it's done.

Just 3 Fights, but they're real fleshed out n shit I promise!!! (+ hard mode for each and has trimmer variant for the first one)

Oskodos:
  • Menu character portraits
  • Most of the sprites for the 3 new playable characters
  • Most new icons
  • Playable Floyd
  • The interaction sprites for the overworld
  • Actual good writing
  • More prolly I'm forgetting...
GunGod64:
  • Playable Anaconda
  • Sprites for the 3 new playable characters
  • Some icons
  • Song: Dial Tone
Nihil: A LOT of music tracks:
  • Impish Dude
  • A lot to Unfold
  • Ad Infinitum
  • Tedious Troublemaker
  • Danger Mode
  • One Last Grind
Chansuln dun Effundensque:
  • Song: Telekino-Wrath
  • Song: Infinity Unfolds
  • Wally Menu Art
Tigh Tass:
  • FUCKING NOTHING !!!!
  • jk
  • Ideas
  • Writing
  • Being a good friend :)

and ofc me Triple A (so awesome)
